personal_projects.title: Placemento: MCA Placement Portal
personal_projects.description: Developed a comprehensive Placement Portal website for MCA students with robust security, intuitive UX, and interactive data visualization using MERN stack.
features: Customized AG Grid and AG Charts for Enhanced UI
Robust Backend APIs with Security Measures

personal_projects.title: Leetcode Rating Predictor
personal_projects.description: Developed LeetCode Rating Predictor using LSTM model for accurate contest performance forecasts with React frontend and FastAPI backend.

personal_projects.title: Portfolio React
personal_projects.description: This is my portfolio website which is made using ReactJS. It shows my skills, projects, and other details.
features: Single Page Application For Mobile View
Multi Page Application For Desktop View

personal_projects.title: Contact Manager
personal_projects.description: This is a contact manager web app which is made using ReactJS. It is used to store contacts and their details.
